title: RBI Grade B – Phase II Syllabus

children.title: Paper I: Economic and Social Issues (ESI)
Linkages between financial markets and economy
Role of Indian banks in economic development
Role of RBI in development process
Liberalisation and opening up of Indian economy
Paper III: General Finance and Management (GFM)
Functions of Reserve Bank of India
Impact of global finance on Indian financial system
Role of information technology in communication
